name: Valhalla Hills: Sand of the Damned
summary: In the first DLC of the Viking adventure Valhalla Hills, our valiant heroes brave the harshness of desert survival. Scorpions and mummies are not the only challanges on the road to Valhalla, though. The earth itself will make life difficult, as it lies barren and dry without irrigation.
